questions.name: Which data transforms are used to initialize property while creating case?(Choose Two)

options.answer: pyDefault
pySetFieldDefaults
CurrentOperator
NewParty

questions.name: Data transform can iterate over which properties.

options.answer: Page List
Page Group
Value Group
Value List

questions.name: Which action can be used to call a Data transform in a data transform?

options.answer: Apply Data Transform
Append to
Sort
Update Page

questions.name: How to populate a page list with hard coded data? (Choose Two)

options.answer: using Append to
Using When
Using Set
using For each page in

questions.name: What is an action in a data transform?

options.answer: An action is the individual operation specified in each row on the Definition tab of a data transform.
More than one action can be selected for a row.
New action can be added for data transform.
Few actions are only visible when you modify the data transform in Designer studio mode.

questions.name: What is the use of pyDefault data transform?

options.answer: While creating a case, default property values are set for the case using this Data transform.
While updating a case, default property values are set for the case using this Data transform.
Only for the first update of case, pyDefault data transform gets executed.
This data transform won`t be executed ever for any case.

questions.name: What is the use of pySetFieldDefaults data transform? (Choose Two)

options.answer: While creating a case, default property values are set for the case using this Data transform.
While updating a case, default property values are set for the case using this Data transform.
The first time you create a view for your case type in the Case Designer, creates this data transform and pyDefault Data transform.
This data transform won`t be executed ever for any case.

questions.name: How pySetFieldDefaults data transform is executed?

options.answer: While creating a case, pyDefault Data transform calls pySetFieldDefaults.
While updating a case, pyDefault Data transform calls pySetFieldDefaults.
While creating a case, pyStartCase flow or process calls pySetFieldDefaults
While updating a case, pyStartCase flow or process calls pySetFieldDefaults

questions.name: Whats true about a data transform row with action named 'Set'. (Choose Two)

options.answer: Relation can be only equal to
Target can be a property or constant value.
Source can have a property or a constant value.
Relation dropdown can be changed.

questions.name: You are using pyDefault to set the manager property to Sharon Smith. What do you use as your Target and Source values? (Choose which one is least applicable)

options.answer: You use the manager property as the Target and "Sharon Smith" as the Source.
You Select action as 'Set'
You should select relation as '='
You should select relation as 'equal to'

questions.name: You are trying to create a complaint case for customer but customer view is not rendering in the user interface. What may be the probable cause? (Choose Two)

options.answer: There is a when condition to hide the view
Customer view is sourced from a page which might not be populated
Customer view data source is initialized but with blank value
None of the above

questions.name: You are adding a page list to an already created view in the case designer.How system manages this action for you?

options.answer: Pega Platform adds these properties in pySetFieldDefaults for you automatically.
Pega Platform adds these properties in pyDefaults for you automatically.
Pega Platform adds these properties in pyStartCase for you automatically.
None of the above

questions.name:
Class A is having pyLabel set as 'Label A', pyNote set as 'Note A' in pyDefault Data transform. Class A-B is having pyLabel set as 'Label B', pyNote set as 'Note B' in pyDefault Data transform.
The super class option is not selected for pyDefault of Class A but selected for Class A-B. When you create a case for A-B class, what would be the value of pyLabel and pyNote.

options.answer: The case would have pyLabel as 'Label A', pyNote set as 'Note A'
The case would have pyLabel as 'Label A', pyNote set as 'Note B'
The case would have pyLabel as 'Label B', pyNote set as 'Note A'
The case would have pyLabel as 'Label B', pyNote set as 'Note B'

questions.name:
Q:Class A is having pyLabel set as 'Label A', pyNote set as 'Note A' in pyDefault Data transform. Class A-B is having pyLabel set as 'Label B' in pyDefault Data transform.
The super class option is not selected for pyDefault of Class A but selected for Class A-B. When you create a case for A-B class, what would be the value of pyLabel and pyNote.

options.answer: The case would have pyLabel as 'Label A', pyNote set as 'Note A'
The case would have pyLabel as 'Label A', pyNote set as 'Note B'
The case would have pyLabel as 'Label B', pyNote set as 'Note A'
The case would have pyLabel as 'Label B', pyNote set as 'Note B'

questions.name:
Q:Class A is having pyLabel set as 'Label A', pyNote set as 'Note A' in pyDefault Data transform. Class A-B is having pyLabel set as 'Label B' in pyDefault Data transform.
The super class option is selected for pyDefault of Class A and selected for Class A-B. When you create a case for A-B class, what would be the value of pyLabel and pyNote.

options.answer: The case would have pyLabel as 'Label A', pyNote set as 'Note A'
The case would have pyLabel as 'Label A', pyNote set as 'Note B'
The case would have pyLabel as 'Label B', pyNote set as 'Note A'
The case would have pyLabel as 'Label B', pyNote set as 'Note B'

questions.name:
Q:Class A is having pyLabel set as 'Label A', pyNote set as 'Note A' in pyDefault Data transform. Class A-B is having pyLabel set as 'Label B' in pyDefault Data transform.
The super class option is selected for pyDefault of Class A and not selected for Class A-B. When you create a case for A-B class, what would be the value of pyLabel and pyNote.

options.answer: The case would have pyLabel as 'Label A', pyNote set as ''
Only the case would have pyLabel as 'Label A', pyNote won`t set
Only the case would have pyLabel as 'Label B', pyNote won`t set
The case would have pyLabel as 'Label B', pyNote set as ''

questions.name: Q:What data transform feature do you use when you want to set a different default value for the same property within a hierarchy of subclasses?

options.answer: Super class feature provided you have used the same data transform name in the hierarchy of subclasses
Apply Data Transform
Super class feature doesn`t matter whether you have used the same data transform name in the hierarchy of subclasses
None of the above

questions.name:
Q:You have added a page list property named Dependents to a view in the Case Designer. This page list contains the property .Relationship. You want to display the list in the view and populate a field with the default value of Not Applicable.
How do you configure the pySetFieldDefaults data transform to meet this requirement?

options.answer: Set .Dependents(1).Relationship to Not Applicable
Set .Dependents(1).pyLabel to an empty string and a parameter named Not Applicable
Set .Dependents(1).pyLabel and a comment action using the value Not Applicable
Set Not Applicable to equal .Dependents(1).Relationship

questions.name: Q:In which two of the following situations would you use a data transform? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Execute a flow action
Create properties after the case has been created
Set default values when creating a case
Copy Data from one page to another

questions.name: Q:You use the clipboard tool to perform which two tasks? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Review the current values of case data
Test case behavior by setting property values for an open case
Test a rule to determine whether the rule executes correctly
Test whether a declarative expression properly calculates a target value

questions.name: Q:How to test whether the rule executes correctly or not?

options.answer: Using Clipboard tool
Using Tracer tool
Using PAL
Using the rule form

questions.name: Q:How to test whether a declarative expression property calculates a target value?

options.answer: Using Clipboard tool
Using Tracer tool
Using PAL
Using Declare expression rule form

questions.name: Q:What is Clipboard Right pane? (Choose Two)

options.answer: The right pane lists all of the properties defined on the selected page, and their values.
You can also update property values and even add new properties to the page to represent data not captured in your application.
Clipboard right pane doesn`t show the system pages data elements.
Clipboard right pane doesn`t allow to delete property?

questions.name: Q:What is System pages? (Choose Two)

options.answer: The System Pages category contains pages that describe the current user session, such as the active user and the active application.
System pages cannot be updated by user.
All System pages starts with px or py or pz.
All System pages are not editable from clipboard too.

questions.name: Q:What is linked property pages? (Choose Two)

options.answer: The Linked Property Pages contains read-only pages created by linked properties, which contain information from data objects referenced by a linked property.
Linked properties are advanced data constructs, typically created and configured by Senior System Architects (SSAs) or Lead System Architects (LSAs).
Linked property is editable.
Linked property can only be referred in User Interface rule.

questions.name: Q:What is the Data pages?(choose the least applicable)

options.answer: The Data Pages category contains read-only data pages defined by data page rules.
Data pages are persistent pages in memory, used to cache data.
This data is often sourced from outside the application, such as from a third-party or a system of record.
Data pages contain editable data pages too.

questions.name: Q:To delete the page, which pane of clipboard tool is useful.

options.answer: The left pane.
The Header.
The right pane Header.
Not Applicable.

questions.name: Q:What is a child case?

options.answer: When child case is opened, pyWorkCover page is populated with it`s parent data.
Child case may have more than one parent
Child case class can be inherited from Work-Object- or Work-Folder- or work-cover-
Parent can have only one child case.

questions.name: Q:What is true related to embedded page?

options.answer: Embedded page only appears in Pages listed under User Pages.
Embedded page is used to refer a data type
An Embedded page cannot have any other embedded page inside it.
All embedded pages are of class Embed-

questions.name: Q:Readonly Data pages would appear under which clipboard category Pages?

options.answer: User Pages.
Data Pages.
Linked Property Pages
System Pages

questions.name: Q:Editable Data pages would appear under which clipboard category Pages?

options.answer: User Pages.
Data Pages.
Linked Property Pages
System Pages

questions.name: Q:Application is grouped under which clipboard category page?

options.answer: User Pages.
Data Pages.
Linked Property Pages
System Pages

questions.name: Q:Which type of information is stored in AccessGroup?

options.answer: information about the current application you logged in.
information about the access group you logged in.
Data cached from an outside system
Information about the current requestor

questions.name: Q:Which type of information is stored in Application?

options.answer: information about the current application you logged in.
information about the pega server
Data cached from an outside system
Information about the current requestor

questions.name: Q:Which type of information is stored in pyWorkPage?

options.answer: information about the current operator
information about the pega server
Data cached from an outside system
Information about a case

questions.name: Q:Which type of information is stored in OperatorID?

options.answer: information about the current operator
information about the pega server
Data cached from an outside system
Information about a case

questions.name: Q:Which type of information is stored in pxRequestor?

options.answer: information about the current operator
information about the pega server
Data cached from an outside system
Information about the current requestor

questions.name: Q:AccessGroup is grouped under which clipboard category page?

options.answer: User Pages.
Data Pages.
Linked Property Pages
System Pages

questions.name: Q:What is pyReportContentPage?

options.answer: Running a ListView generates this page.
Running a Report Definition generates this page.
Running a summary view generates this page.
It's a system managed page.

questions.name: Q:Please select the points true related to a data element? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Its pairing of name and value of the data element.
Data elements are stored in memory on a page.
Data element can contain page(s)
Data element can only be manipulated by system

questions.name: Q:Please select the points true related to a Page? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Its pairing of name and value of the data element.
A page is a structure for organizing data elements in an application
Few pages are created by the system to track user or session data.
Data element can only be manipulated by system

questions.name: Q:Please select the points true related to a Page? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Its pairing of name and value of the data element.
A page is a structure for organizing data elements in an application
If a page contains embedded pages, an expand arrow is displayed to the left of the page name.
Data element can only be manipulated by system

questions.name: Q:Please select the points true related to a Page? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Its pairing of name and value of the data element.
A page is a structure for organizing data elements in an application
A page can only be created by User.
Page can be a data object, such as a hotel reservation or a customer

questions.name: Q:Please select the points true related to a Page? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Clipboard can be used to see a page.
Any page can be deleted from clipboard.
Any page can be edited from clipboard.
Page can be a data object or list of Data objects.

questions.name: Q:What is clipboard? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Clipboard is a structure in memory which contain page(s).
Clipboard is the portion of memory on the server reserved by Pega for the data generated by applications
A Data transform can be executed with page context.
Clipboard shows all the logged in users data.

questions.name: Q:What is clipboard? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Clipboard can be used to see other logged in user`s session data.
Clipboard is accessible to all the user access roles.
An activity can be executed with page context.
Clipboard can only be used to see logged in user`s session data.

questions.name: Q:What is clipboard? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Clipboard can be used to see other logged in user`s session data.
Clipboard is accessible to all the user access roles.
To view data that is in memory.
When you select a page, the Clipboard tool lists all the properties on each page and the value of those properties.

questions.name: Q:What is clipboard? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Clipboard can be used to see other logged in user`s session data.
Clipboard is accessible to all the user access roles.
Clipboard tool can be opened by clicking the Clipboard icon on the Developer toolbar in Dev Studio.
When you select a page, the Clipboard tool lists all the properties on each page and the value of those properties.

options.answer: The left pane.
The Header.
The right pane Header.
Not Applicable.

options.answer: The left pane.

The Header.

questions.name: Q:What is a thread in clipboard tool? (Choose Two)

options.answer: A thread can be selected from clipboard left pane header.
Each thread corresponds to a logged in user in the Pega application
The clipboard contains one thread dedicated to the Admin Studio environment.
Pega assigns each open rule a unique thread

questions.name: Q:What is true related to embedded page?(Choose Two)

options.answer: Embedded page only appears in Pages listed under User Pages.
Embedded page is used to refer a data type
An Embedded page cannot have any other embedded page inside it.
To view the embedded pages, click the expand arrow on the left of Page name.

questions.name:
Q:There is an employee clipboard page which holds following data elements.
Firstname Jil
Lastname   Jack
How to populate the FullName as Jil Jack (Choose Two)

options.answer: Write a Data transform to set the Fullname as .Firstname+.Lastname
Write a Data transform to set the Fullname as .Firstname+" "+.Lastname
Write a Data page to set the Fullname as .Firstname+" "+.Lastname
Write a declare expression to set the Fullname as .Firstname+" "+.Lastname

questions.name: Q:What is use of pyWorkPage in clipboard? (Choose Two)

options.answer: It stores all the data generated while creating and processing a case.
It can have multiple data type to refer different Data objects.
pyWorkPage can be seen in standard thread.
pyWorkCover is same as pyWorkPage

questions.name: Q:What is use of clipboard in implementing application? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Clipboard is used to improve system performance.
Clipboard is used to see the system generated alerts and exception.
Clipboard is used to view and verify the data elements.
Clipboard is used to debug the data in some cases.

questions.name: Q:What is a thread in clipboard tool? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Multiple threads can be selected from clipboard header at one time.
Each thread corresponds to a unique action currently managed by Pega
The clipboard contains one thread dedicated to the Dev Studio environment.
Pega assigns one thread for each open case.

questions.name: Q:What is the use of left pane of Clipboard? (Choose the one least applicable)

options.answer: The left pane lists each page defined on the clipboard for the selected thread.
The left pane lists all the threads.
The left pane provides search feature
the left pane contains the tools and Help icon

questions.name:
Q:There is a employee class named Pega-Employee mapped to a table Employee.
Pega-Employee has few property rules which are mapped to the columns of Employe table.

Pega-Employee--------------->Employee

	Firstname------------------->Firstname

	Lastname-------------------->Lastname

	Location-------------------->Location

The case contains the Location data element.

There is a report which is fetching firstname and lastname of all employees.

How to modify this report to fetch the employees having the same location of case. (Choose Two)

options.answer: Create a report with filter .Location is equal to pyWorkPage.Location
Mention the pyWorkPage and it`s class in the pages and classes section of Report rule
Mention the pyReportContentPage and it`s class in the pages and classes section of Report rule
Create a new report as present report can`t be modified for the need.

questions.name: Q:Why the class is mentioned in pages and classes section of report definition rule.(Choose the least applicable)

options.answer: If you omit the class information, Pega cannot obtain property values from the correct page.
Pega validates the properties based on the class.
Without mentioning class, the report rule that references the properties will not function correctly.
For documentation purpose only.

questions.name: Q:Why the class is mentioned in pages and classes section of report definition rule.(choose the least applicable)

options.answer: If you omit the class information, Pega cannot obtain property values from the correct page.
Pega validates the properties based on the class.
Without mentioning class, the report rule that references the properties will not function correctly.
For documentation purpose only.
